short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple landing page for new tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple landing page for your new Google Chrome Tabs,

Every time you open a new tab, you will see the display of your desired name and a single focus for your day.
The background and greeting changes depending on the time of your day.

To remove the tab extension, click the ellipses menu in the upper-right corner of your Chrome browser and click the extensions link below the other Tools menu. On this page you will see Manalo Landing Tab that you have installed, you can remove the extension after pressing the remove button.

Share your thoughts about my mini project about the new tab extension at the comments!
